casebody.data:
Christopher M. BAGWELL
v.
Brittany O. BAGWELL 2018-CJ-1025 Supreme Court of Louisiana. August 31, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE 26th JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF BOSSIER

Denied

Hughes, J., would grant the writ to remand to the trial court for rendition of judgment from the May 2018 hearing.
